description:
This MCP server provides seamless access to your Ghost instance, featuring a rich set of MCP tools for managing posts, users, members, tiers, offers, and newsletters.

Note: this is NOT an official MCP server by Ghost.org, and is a direct fork of MFYDev's ghost-mcp.

capabilities.name: posts_browse
capabilities.description: Browse and list posts with filtering and pagination

capabilities.name: posts_read
capabilities.description: Read a specific post by ID or slug

capabilities.name: posts_add
capabilities.description: Create a new post with title, content, tags, and publishing options

capabilities.name: members_browse
capabilities.description: Browse and list members with filtering and pagination

capabilities.name: members_read
capabilities.description: Read a specific member by ID or email

capabilities.name: members_add
capabilities.description: Add a new member with email and subscription details

capabilities.name: users_read
capabilities.description: Read a specific user by ID or slug

capabilities.name: tags_read
capabilities.description: Read a specific tag by ID or slug

capabilities.name: tiers_read
capabilities.description: Read a specific tier by ID

capabilities.name: offers_read
capabilities.description: Read a specific offer by ID

capabilities.name: newsletters_read
capabilities.description: Read a specific newsletter by ID

capabilities.name: roles_read
capabilities.description: Read a specific role by ID

capabilities.name: admin_site_ping
capabilities.description: Ping the Ghost Admin API to check connectivity
